role.argrole: caller (the subject usually two or plural)

example.parse: (S (PUNC *) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS تداعى) (NP-SBJ (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM نواب) (NP (NOUN_PROP بعبدا))) (CONJ و) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM رؤساء) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN بلديات) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN ساحل) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN المتن) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الجنوبي))) (PUNC -) (NP (NOUN_PROP بعبدا)))))) (PP-CLR (PREP الى) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN اجتماع) (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_GEN طارئ))) (PP-TMP (PREP في) (NP (NP (DET+ADJ_NUM+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الخامسة)) (NP-TMP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC عصر) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN غد))))) (PP-LOC (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN مقر) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN بلدية) (NP (DET+NOUN_PROP الشياح))))) (PUNC ,) (PP-PRP (PREP ل) (NP (NOUN تدارس) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN مواضيع) (NP (NP (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الضريبة)) (PP (PREP على) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN القيمة) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المضافة))))

arg.g: Deputies of Baabda and mayors of the coast of South Metn

example.arg: نواب بعبدا ورؤساء بلديات ساحل المتن الجنوبي

arg.g: To study matters of value added tax
